articles.title: Haaland be offered HUGE new deal as Manchester City send 'hands off' message to Real Madrid - Goal.com
articles.description: Manchester City are set to offer a massive new deal to their star striker Erling Haaland amid interest from Real Madrid.
articles.content:
Manchester City are set to offer a massive new deal to their star striker Erling Haaland amid interest from Real Madrid.
